featured.text: But what they do not realize is that overtreatment—too many scans, too many blood tests, too many procedures—may pose harm.

definition.zh_def: 過度治療，指對病人進行不必要或過多的醫療干預。
definition.en_def: Overtreatment refers to the unnecessary or excessive medical intervention provided to a patient.
definition.example: Overtreatment can lead to more harm than good for patients.
